root: ^Hey kid. I heard you're leaving town. I guess this is the we'll see each other.
^I know. It's sad having to leave, but I wished I could stay longer-
^I will stop you right there. You're a Royal Flower Picker right? It's your duty to help other villages and their people in need.
^Just like you've done with me and this scurffy backwater town.
^My wife, kid, and I will always appreciate what you've done.
^Aw thanks John that means a lot.
^You're right, I'll do my best and make sure no suffers from their lack of flowers and plants.
^Good luck kid, I know you'll do great.
